name: Circus monkey
description: This delicious Caramel Banana milk/milkshake was created on Interactive Mixing on the Diydownunder network.
author: Dank1

reviews.text: Good recipe! It's a little too banana fwd for me and that's due to TFA Ripe Banana... I'm not sure if I find that flavoring really strong or that I can just pick it out of a recipe (kinda like CAP CDS) because the % isn't that high,  especially for TFA... I just find it overpowering the mix a bit for me... on the other hand my wife loves this recipe,  so there's "taste is subjective" in action.. lol üòÅ in the future I might just leave out the Ripe Banana or sub it out for VT Banana Custard... either way I'll most likely mix this again,  the rest is a balanced banana caramel milkshake... nice and creamy... good job! üëçüëç
